title: SCP-825-KO
content:

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[[SCP-825-KO]]] Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant
**Author:** [[*user Bangja]]
**Tranlsator:** [[*user fluxman]]
**Original Article:** http://scpko.wikidot.com/scp-825-ko
----
[[=]]
[http://ko.scp-wiki.net/bangja â˜…]
[[/=]]


[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/b.jpg|caption=An instance of SCP-825-KO]]
**Store No:** SCP-825-KO-1

**Rating:** Very Good(â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†)[[footnote]]MFDS(Ministry of Food and Drug Safety) Approved[[/footnote]]

**Regular Checkup Protocols:** All staff are required to wear sanitary caps and clothing. Our food is cooked in a clean open-style kitchen. Our establishment is sanitized daily to ensure the safest meal possible.

**Establishment Description:** Enjoy a quality sashimi meal at a reasonable price! Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant provides you with the best products[[footnote]]SCP-825-KO[[/footnote]] from the earliest fishery auction, to make sure our customers are treated with the freshest and highest quality sashimi. Our establishment never manipulates our scales.

Our flounder sashimi is suitable for growing teenagers and treating skin conditions, including wrinkles. They are high in protein while being low in fat, good meal for losing weight. The tender texture makes it irresistible for younger customers. Our best selling menu does not share the fishy taste of the same menu of other establishments while it virtually melts in your mouth.

Our salmon sashimi is known for its opulent taste. Our recipe boosts the deep umami and aroma while clearing the fish most of its unpleasant smell, making the menu popular for men and women of all ages alike. It is also a good source of DHA and EPA, which are perfect for replenishing your stamina lost on a hot summer day.

[[collapsible show="Place of Origin â–¼" hide="Place of Origin â–²"]]
Rice(Locally Sourced), Kimchi(Locally Sourced), Chili Powder(Locally Sourced), Flounder(Locally Sourced), Salmon(Locally Sourced), Yellow Tail(Locally Sourced), Live Fish(China), Snapper(Locally Sourced), Squid(China), Octopus(China), Spotty-Belled Greenlings(China), Mullet(Locally Sourced)
[[/collapsible]]

[[>]]
Owner - Hyeoun-Wook Hwang-Bo

Directions - Donghae-daero, Sokcho-si, Gangwon-do, Across the Farmer's Union market Expo

Open every day - from 15:00 ~ 2:00 next day
[[/>]]
@@@@
@@@@
**Addendum:**
> **14.6.20**
> **Menu:** Three Salmon Sashimi, unsmoked
> **Price:** KRW 34,000
> ----
> **Comment:** I loved it! Also enjoyed the bonus spicy mixed sashimi ðŸ˜
> [[image http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/1.png width="30%"]]
> [[>]]
> **--Researcher Shi-Hyun Kim**
> [[/>]]
> ----
> **Owner's Comments:** Thanks for visiting!
> [[>]]
> @@@@
> **--Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner of Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant**
> [[/>]]


> **16.6.20**
> **Menu:** Two medium Flounder Sashimi + Rockfish Stew
> **Price:** KRW 78,000
> ----
> **Comment:** My coworker told me to order the flounder I loved the spice makes my mouth water...I cant help but to drool ðŸ˜…sorry the stew smells too good ^^;
> Thinking of returning when I can~
> [[image http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/3.png width="30%"]]
> [[>]]
> **--Deok-Gu Jang, Security Team Leader**
> [[/>]]
> ----
> **Owner's Comments:** Thanks for visiting!
> [[>]]
> @@@@
> **--Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner of Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant**
> [[/>]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
> **22.6.20**
> **Menu:** One Snapper Sashimi
> **Budget:** KRW 70,000
> ----
> **Comment:** It doesn't taste sour to me.
> [[image http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/4.png width="30%"]]
> [[>]]
> **--Antimeme expert Han-Seok Lee**
> [[/>]]
> ----
> **Owner's Comments:** Thanks for coming. Is there anything else you need?
> [[>]]
> @@@@
> **--Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner of Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant**
> [[/>]]

> **22.6.20**
> **Menu:** Sokcho Mulhoe
> **Budget:** KRW 11,000
> ----
> **Comment:** I understand now.
>
> The fish- No, I mean... Is the texture off? No, it's not that. Unknown place of origin--
>
> To put, this tastes seriously awful.
> [[image http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/o.png width="30%"]]
> [[>]]
> **--Antimeme expert Han-Seok Lee**
> [[/>]]
> ----
> **Owner's Comments:** We'll do our best to improve. Thank you for your comment.
> [[>]]
> @@@@
> **--Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner of Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant**
> [[/>]]

> **22.6.20**
> **Menu:** A cup of instant coffee from the vending machine
> **Budget:** KRW 200
> ----
> **Comment:** Good. I got used to it, to some extent.
>
> The menu of the establishment has ##red|confusing texture, uncoordinated, random## anomalies. Please understand the errors on this ##red|review## due to the ##red|temperature of the snapper.## This is presumably the result of a powerful ##red|climatological hazard## ##red|natural hazard##, ##red|fishing hazard##
>
> ##red|The side dishes##, ##red|the mussel soup##, ##red|the radsih kimchi##, correction, ##red|all-you-can get menu##, ##red|rice##, has no limits. ##red|Taste tests## by double-blind methods yield no result. However there is clear ##red|enjoyment##.
>
> ##red|The gochujang sauce## causes extreme ##red|satiation##. I suggest that some time, not now, our team ##red|tries the fresh sashimi of the establishment.##
> [[image http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/co.png width="30%"]]
> [[>]]
> **--Antimeme expert Han-Seok Lee**
> [[/>]]
> ----
> **Owner's Comments:** //N/A//
> [[>]]
> @@@@
> **--Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner of Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant**
> [[/>]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
> **23.6.20**
> **Menu:** Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner
> **Budget:** N/A
> ----
> **Comment:** Apologies for the delay. The owner tried to flee. Before that, something was notably off. Our members couldn't even touch their chopsticks. The place was seriously unhygienic, even for me. I packed the leftover food to go; couldn't have a bite myself.
>
> [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/SCP-825-accessrestricted.png width="30%"]]
> [[>]]
> **--Han-Gyeol Park, On-site Team leader**
> [[/>]]
> ----
> **Owner's Comments:** //N/A//, //The owner was sent to the site medical team.//
> [[>]]
> @@@@
> **--Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner of Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant**
> [[/>]]

> **23.6.20**
> **Menu:** Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner(Captured)
> **Budget:** N/A
> ----
> Mr Hwang-Bo finally told the truth about ##red|the price raise##. He has been smuggling ##red|wasabi## under the radar of the police using the ##red|edible-parts-to-fish ratio##.
>
> The tasting incident appears to be the result of unclear instructions.
> [[image http://scp-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/SCP-825-accessrestricted.png width="30%"]]
> [[>]]
> **--Han-Gyeol Park, On-site Team leader**
> [[/>]]
> ----
> **Owner's Comments:** //N/A//
> [[>]]
> @@@@
> **--Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner of Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant**
> [[/>]]

> **23.6.20**
> **Menu:** All SCP-825-KO instances(Alive)
> **Budget:** N/A
> ----
> Banning all further ##red|eating out##. The research department established the ##red|definition of flavour##. ##red|Regular Checkup Protocols## are to be established as well. The on-site team is to retrieve all SCP-825-KO from SCP-825-KO-1.
> [[image http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/6.png width="30%"]]
> [[>]]
> **--Hyun-Cheol Jang, Director of Site-27K**
> [[/>]]
> ----
> **Owner's Comments:** //N/A//
> [[>]]
> @@@@
> **--Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Owner of Sokcho Tongkeun Mulhoe Restaurant**
> [[/>]]
@@@@

@@@@

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[include component:image-block name=
http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-825-ko/a.jpg|caption=Chef Paul filleting SCP-825-KO]]

**Store No.:** SCP-825-KO-2

**Rating:** Excellent(â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…)[[footnote]]Approved by Higher Command[[/footnote]]

**Regular Checkup Protocols:** Site-27K has its hygiene taken care of by janitorial staff from higher command. The Internal Security Department is to perform sanitary checkups of respective areas every three months.

Staff personnel are to undergo monthly hygienics education.

**Establishment Description:** Site-27K provides guests with quality sashimi at a reasonable price. Fish are bought daily from a fishery auction at dawntime for freshness and higher quality. Site-27K does not manipulate its scales.

Site-27K's proudest menu, the flounder is known for aiding with the growth of teenagers and good for dermatologic conditions that come with age including wrinkles. High protein contents and low fat contents of the subject prevents obesity. Younger consumers prefer this menu due to its texture. Flounders of Site-27K lack the rancid smell that the fish of other sites have, and has a unique texture, explaining its popularity.

The salmon sashimi of Site-27K has an incredibly richer flavour. Individuals consuming this menu feel outstanding umami and aroma aided by its lack of unpleasant aftertaste. Profuse amounts of DHA and EPA content provides ample nourishment at hotter times of the year, such as now. Naturally, the menu is thought to have a higher potential of drawing more customers.

[[collapsible show="Place of Origin â–¼" hide="Place of Origin â–²"]]
Rice(Unknown), Kimchi(Unknown), Chili Powder(Unknown), Flounder(Unknown), Salmon(Unknown), Yellowtail(Unknown), Live Fish(Unknown), Snapper(Unknown), Octopus(Unknown), Squid(Unknown), Spotty-Belled Greenrings(Unknown), Mullet(Unknown)
[[/collapsible]]
[[>]]
Owner - Hyeon-Wook Hwang-Bo, Director of Site-27K

Directions - [REDACTED]

Open 24/7
[[/>]]
